```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(ggforce)
library(gridExtra)

plot_join <- function(title, fill_x, fill_y) {
  ggplot() +
    geom_circle(aes(x0 = 1, y0 = 1, r = 1), fill = fill_x, alpha = 0.6, color = "black") +
    geom_circle(aes(x0 = 2, y0 = 1, r = 1), fill = fill_y, alpha = 0.6, color = "black") +
    annotate("text", x = 0.5, y = 2.2, label = title, size = 5, hjust = 0) +
    annotate("text", x = 1, y = 1, label = "x", size = 6) +
    annotate("text", x = 2, y = 1, label = "y", size = 6) +
    theme_void() +
    coord_fixed()
}

inner <- plot_join("inner_join", "white", "white")
left  <- plot_join("left_join", "#56B4E9", "white")
right <- plot_join("right_join", "white", "#E69F00")
full  <- plot_join("full_join", "#56B4E9", "#E69F00")
semi  <- plot_join("semi_join", "#56B4E9", "white")  # nur x-Teil mit Match
anti  <- plot_join("anti_join", "#56B4E9", "white")  # nur x-Teil ohne Match

grid.arrange(inner, left, right, full, semi, anti, ncol = 3)
```
